citations.narrative:
*** At the time of this inspection a number of rats were noted both in and around the main bear enclosure.
Because rodents may carry disease agents and because they may cause the bears physical injury, a safer and
more effective program of control than presently exists must be established.
Correct by 6/23/14
NOTE This inspection was conducted on 6/9/14 and 6/13/14.
An exit interview was conducted with the licensee on 6/13/14.

narrative:
3.131
SANITATION.   
***  At the time of this inspection a number of rats were noted both in and around the main bear enclosure.
       Because rodents may carry disease agents and because they may cause the bears physical injury, a safer and
       more effective program of control than presently exists must be established.
Correct by 6/23/14
NOTE  This inspection was conducted on 6/9/14 and 6/13/14.  
              An exit interview was conducted with the licensee on 6/13/14.
